title: Large Giant Revel 29er 1x10
text: I am very reluctant to sell this bike. I bought this bike with my first salary in 2018. I've put a lot of time, money, effort and sweat into this bike. It's brought me a lot of good times. This bike has never been for a full service so if you can afford it definitely take it for a good check-up. I've done most of the work myself. Only service it's had was brake bleeding and replacing an old rear wheel bearing. The rest was all me. This bike has a lot of personality a.k.a dings and scratches, so don't expect a new bike. I'm selling this bike because I feel like I've reached a point were I want to try something new. Would like to start a new hobby, hopefully the funds from this sale will help me achieve that. Upgrades:Maxxis 2.35 IKON tyres, these are great tyres with a lot of rubber left. Nice and thick. Recently replaced the rim tape with Gorilla tape. Wheels might need slime (I have a bottle). Also had the valves replaced recently. ( I have a decent stand up pump with gage)New grips, some hate them, I like them. I have extra kit for grips too. I have gloves too"new" Second hand pedals. Old ones were stripped, these work fine. Can adjust cleat tightness easily. I have size 9/10 shoes if you want them.Tektro hydraulic brakes with brand new pads, they've probably been used twice, might need to run them in a bit more before they are working as they should. Brakes were recently serviced and bleed.Bottom bracket was replaced with a new SHIMANO one, no squeaking.1x10 groupset - SRAM 36T front - SHIMANO XT 10 speed rear. Gears shift fine, sometimes a little temperamental on changing gears while climbing a hill, but works fine. I'll give you my chain lube.Rock Shox Reverb Dropper. I took this off when I was doing a lot of road cycling, tried to save some weight. It's bit heavy, cable is tough to manage, but works fine. Helps A LOT with descending especially with this hard tail. You need to extra leverage. This dropper also functions as a small shock absorber for your lower back, pretty cool.New shorter stem I have the old GIANT stem if you want it.Small pouch clips into bracket under seat. I have 2 CO2 bomb valves, multitools and a lot more you can have.As I've said, I'm reluctant to sell my bike, so please be respectful of the price. We can negotiate when you come take a look at this shiny turd. Thanks

title: Giant Trance Medium 27.5
text: SizeMModel Year2018Wheel Size27.5" (650b)Frame MaterialAluminiumRiding StyleTrail/EnduroThis trail ripping machine is in great condition. The biggest shock i had with this bike is that it climbs as well as it descends.The Giant Trance changed from it's predecessor in 2018 it was given a 150mm front fork, Boost spacing front and rear plus a trunion mount metric shock with the Carbon swingarm bracket. This stiffened the bike up and made it way more capable with little to no peddle bob.This is my personal bike so I did a few preformance upgrades which are as follows:1 x 11 conversion 11x46 cassette with 32t front chainring.Shimano XT brakes.Shimano XT cranckBRAND NEW Maxxis Minion DHR2 front tyre ( no milage) i still have the High roller it came with which is as new as the bike was not ridden much.Brendog Death grips in soft compound thick.Renthal Carbon fat bar 780mmNaturally tyres are tubeless with conversion done.I also ordered the soft negative air spring for the Aion fork which due to reviews make the fork super supple, this will arrive in the post any day now.Pedals will not be included that are in the pic but i do have a set of SPD to throw in the deal.Extras include spare Maxxis high roller tyreXT rear derrailluer ( have not had time to fit )Spare 11 speed chainNegative air spring

title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. Full QC check and service undergone prior to delivery.Packaging: All bikes are securely boxed and packaged to avoid any damages in transit.Race Ready: Bikes are delivered “race ready” meaning you simply have to fit the front wheel, seat post and pedals and there you go – Riding!Trading hours: Monday to Friday 08h00 – 18h00 Saturday 08h00 to 14h00 Contact us: Tel: (021) 556 8207 or hanber@cycleteknix.co.za or WhatsApp 084 550 1353Address: 145 Blaauwberg Road, Table View, Cape Town, 7441.Website: View our website for more great specials: www.cycleteknix.co.zaItems Available: 1Address: 145 Blaauwberg Rd, Table View, Cape Town, 7441

title: Morewood Prime 8 (26er DH)
text: Was selling whole bike but i guess my price was too high.Now selling the frame for a much more affordable price so that someone else could build it up to how they want it.This is a 1997/99 original Morewood Prime 8 hand built by Patrick Morewood. All machining and welding was done by the man himself and its one of the first frames he ever designed, fabbed and assembled.Reason i am selling it is because i wont do such serious riding to justify the frame... i had my fun with it.It comes with the original Manitou Swinger 6 Way rear coil/air shock as it left the workshop (dont know if it was a factory then :)). Also comes with a brand new FSA headset (cups, bearings etc). Will include the rear brake mount. Pivot bearings are brand new and has new pivot bolts. Will also include the brand new Bottom Bracket.Only thing to mention is the rear shock high speed setting screw is stripped but can still be adjusted with a torqx (the allen head is stripped). This is a hardcore frame, built like a tank. Frame is Aluminum all the way through.

Rear travel increased to 110mm for optimal trail riding setup with 30-35% sag. This creates a comfortable ride that in combination with the larger wheels and the IDS, enhances the rider’s momentum through large rock garden trails and hard hits. Cable hose guides for derailleur enable continuous sealed shifter housing for extended protection against the elements. Increased BB height with correct suspension setup enables god pedal clearance as well as allowing balanced cornering when descending. Tapered head tube 1 1/8” to 1.5” for increased front end stiffness aids steering accuracy. title: FOR SALE. Neomouv electric mountain bike. Ready to tour from Lucca in beautiful Tuscany.
text:
AT PRESENT IN ITALY:  electric mountain bike. Ready to tour
from Lucca in beautiful Tuscany. Saves you the problem of shipping you own bike
or buying / renting.

 

Large
size, almost new, in excellent condition, with many extras. Fitted with
adjustable front suspension and excellent disk brakes, this bike is ready to
take you touring in style, comfort and speed, both off road and on tar. It has
10 speed Shimano derailleur quick shift gears to ensure that you are never in
the wrong gear. Less than one month old, I have done only one tour on this
beautiful bike, through France and Italy, and unfortunately I must now sell it
and return to South Africa.

 

The
extra powerful 500W electric motor helps you climb the hills and allows you to
maintain a good average speed, making it easier to cover greater distances when
touring. The range is over 100 kms on one charge, making it very possible to
ride more than 120 kms per day. 

 

The
bike comes complete with battery and charger, large knobbly Michelin tyres to
minimise the risk of punctures, lights, water bottle carrier, bell, additional
speedo showing average speed and trip meter, rear pannier brackets and 40 L
side panniers, additional rucksack and front handlebar storage bag. There is
also a side stand, tools, a cable lock and spare tubes that are included in the
sale. 

 

This
bike is worth over € 3 000  (about
R 48 000) and I am selling it for only € 2 550 (R 40 800) payable
in Rands in SA or Euros in Italy, or GBP 2 050 in UK.

 

Please
be quick to secure this incredible bargain to
facilitate your summer cycling tour. 

 

Phone
or WhatsApp Robert on +39 351 062 6209 now.  Or chat for more details on +27 82 850-8844


E
mail: magicmarketing@outlook.com
location: Hout Bay, Atlantic Seaboard, Western Cape

title: 2017 Giant Anthem 2 Mountain Bike
text: 2017, Giant Anthem 2, a nimble ride that's a blast to weave through tricky lines or whip around turnsThe Anthem 2 is a fun and flickable 110mm, 27.5-inch offering from Giant. This nimble steed rips through corners and hunts down every site hit. It bunny hops and manuals at will and speedy acceleration adds to the fun. These antics combine with solid downhill and superior climbing performance to make for a solid, straightforward trail option. A few testers experience a suspiciously high number of pedal strikes aboard this bike. Other notable drawbacks are a less than ideal tire and rim width and an outdated cockpit setup with a long stem and narrower bars. Still, this bike is outfitted with an impressive value to performance ratio thanks to its spectacular build kit. The Giant sports Fox suspension, a Shimano SLX 1x11 drivetrain, Shimano Deore M615 brakes and a Giant Contact SL Switch dropper post. The Anthem is a fantastic option if you're more comfortable with smaller wheels and prefer a quick, responsive ride. This bike is well-equipped out of the box, is capable on a wide variety of terrain, and excels in tighter, more technical trails.

The fat tyres have no leaks and have good life still. 
Ideal for sand and mud riding. 


The bad:
Very minor surface rust on handlebars and seat post.
Will 100% pass stab with screwdriver test, no flaking rust. 
Handlebar Grips need to be replaced. 
Chain has been neglected but is still serviceable. 
Brake Pads near the end of service.
Will need tlc like any bike. 

Best for those that are hands-on DIY

text: Abandoned project.  Was going to add on to a ebike... Carbon Fibre shockFront wheelSpecifications:Application: Cross CountryWheel Size: 29"Suspension Type: airTravel: 100 mmSteerer Tube: 1 1/8 - 1.5" taperedAxle Type: Lefty 60Wheel Standard: Lefty 60Brake Mount: disc PM6 (direct mount 160 mm)Technical Information:Offset: 55 mmSteerer Tube Diameter (Stem): 28.6 mmSteerer Tube Diameter (Crown Race): 40 mmAxle to Crown: 510 mmOver Locknut Dimension: Lefty 60Stanchion Tube Diameter mm: 32 mmSteerer Tube Material: CarbonCrown Material: CarbonStanchion Tube Material: AluminiumLower Tube Material: CarbonAdjustment Options:Compression: yesRebound: yesSuspension Stiffness: air pressure adjustRemote: yesTravel Adjustment: noApproved For:Tyre Size (max.): 63 mm (width)Note: When the fork is fully compressed, the tyre clearance to the fork crown must be at least 3 mm.Rotor Size (max.): 180 mmWeight Limit: 138 kg (rider + gear)Note from the manufacturer:The FSA Orbit C-40-ACB No. 42 headset is required.Features:- Delta Cage: three rows of needle bearings for particularly low-friction operation- self-venting Chamber Damper with good temperature management- OppO spring system: air regulation without mechanical parts- StopLock quick-release brake caliper mount for easy and quick installation and removal of the brake caliper, e.g. when changing the wheel (5 mm hex tool required)- with protective carbon GuideGuard around the stanchion tubes, also serves as cable guide for the brake hose- very lightweight and stiff- precision steering- 55 mm OutFront offset optimised for flatter steering angles- SideCar air valve for inflation from the side
